name: The Dark Knight Rises: The Mobile Game
name_original: The Dark Knight Rises: The Mobile Game
description:
The Dark Knight Rises: The Mobile Game is an action-adventure game developed by Gameloft. It came out on 19-07-2012. It was published by Gameloft. On review aggregator Metacritic, The Dark Knight Rises: The Mobile Game has a score of 64. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The Dark Knight Rises: The Mobile Game on Android and iOS.
